headline: GTA Online
subtitle: BF Weevil
content:
Take a seat in the BF Weevil’s time machine and speed away from today’s Los Santos, that hive of maniacal drivers, explosive weapons enthusiasts, and urban stunt bikers.

Now you’re in 70s Los Santos, also a hive of maniacal drivers, explosive weapons enthusiasts, and urban stunt bikers. But here, everyone drives this funky car.

Now available at Southern San Andreas Super Autos.
